name: more-miniloaders
title: More miniloaders
author: Jakzie
description: Adds more miniloaders from Miniloader mod for some modded transport belts. Includes miniloaders for Leighzer's Uranium Logistics, One More Tier, Xander Mod, Iper Belt, Hiladdar's Belts and 5Dim. Adds compatibility with RitnMechanic. Includes an API for mod creators to add their own miniloaders.
